title: I, Darrin, Take This Witch, Samantha
description: Recently married Darren Stephens receives a shock when he discovers that his bride, Samantha, is a witch.

roles.char: Man Speaking with Samantha at the Dinner Table

title: Be It Ever So Mortgaged
description: Darrin and Samantha find their dream house and immediately arouse the suspicions of snooping neighbor Gladys Kravitz.

title: It Shouldn't Happen to a Dog
description: After Darrin's client makes a pass at Samantha, she turns him into a dog and then loses him.

title: Mother, Meet What's His Name
description: Darrin meets his magical mother-in-law Endora for the first time.

title: Help, Help, Don't Save Me
description: Darrin refuses to use Samantha's ideas for an advertising campaign when he thinks they are the product of witchcraft.

title: Little Pitchers Have Big Fears
description: Samantha helps a shy young boy try out for the baseball team despite his overprotective mother.

title: The Witches Are Out
description: Samantha doesn't want Darrin's client to use an ugly old witch in his ad campaign.

title: Witch or Wife
description: When Larry and Louise Tate stumble upon Samantha and Endora having lunch in Paris, she can't return since they think that Darrin sent her over for a mortal vacation.

title: The Girl Reporter
description: A young female reporter takes after Darrin while her jealous boyfriend takes an interest in Samantha.

title: Just One Happy Family
description: Samantha's father Maurice comes for a visit and Endora warns her that he will be furious when he finds out that her husband Darrin is a mortal.

title: It Takes One to Know One
description: Endora employs a beautiful witch to become Darrin's latest model who tries to seduce him and Larry Tate.

title: And Something Makes Three
description: When a nervous Louise Tate has Samantha go with her to the doctor, Larry overhears them and thinks that Darrin is going to be a father.

title: Love Is Blind
description: Darrin is worried about his friend Kermit falling for Samantha's friend Gertrude since he is not sure if she's a witch.

title: Samantha Meets the Folks
description: Samantha meets Darrin's parents for the first time while Aunt Clara is also visiting.

title: A Vision of Sugar Plums
description: When an orphan visits the Stevens' for Christmas who doesn't believe in Santa Claus, Samantha takes him to the North Pole to visit the man himself.

title: It's Magic
description: Samantha assists a down-on-his-luck magician.

title: A Is for Aardvark
description: When Darrin is in bed with a sprained ankle, Samantha makes the house cooperate with him giving him a taste of the power of witchcraft.

title: The Cat's Meow
description: While visiting Chicago with a beautiful client, Darrin thinks he is being watched by a cat and a pelican that may be his wife or mother-in-law.

title: A Nice Little Dinner Party
description: Darrin's mother believes that Endora has designs on her husband.

title: Your Witch Is Showing
description: Darrin suspects that his new assistant is a warlock out to get him.

title: Ling Ling
description: Samantha turns a cat into an alluring woman who becomes a model for Darrin's advertising campaign.

title: Eye of the Beholder
description: Endora makes Darrin wonder about Samantha's age when he finds a picture that looks like her dated 1682.

title: Red Light, Green Light
description: Samantha goes up against city hall to get a traffic light for Morning Glory Circle.

title: Which Witch Is Which?
description: When disguised as Samantha for a dress fitting, Endora meets an intriguing author and decides to tryout the mortal lifestyle. Nosy Gladys Kravitz sees them together.

title: Pleasure O'Riley
description: A model named Pleasure O'Reilly moves in next door who is hiding from her former boyfriend.

title: Driving Is the Only Way to Fly
description: Samantha learns how to drive helping out a very nervous driving instructor.

title: There's No Witch Like an Old Witch
description: To cheer up Aunt Clara over her dwindling powers, Samantha gets her to try her hand at babysitting.

title: Open the Door, Witchcraft
description: Trouble brews between Samantha and Darrin over an automatic garage door opener.

title: Abner Kadabra
description: When Gladys sees Samantha using witchcraft, she convinces Gladys that she is the one with the powers.

title: George the Warlock
description: When Endora tries to get the warlock George to tempt Samantha, he falls for their next door neighbor.

title: That Was My Wife
description: When Samantha and Darrin spend the night at a hotel and Samantha wears a dark wig, Larry spots them and thinks Darrin is having an affair.

title: Illegal Separation
description: Abner Kravitz moves in after he has a fight with Gladys.

title: A Change of Face
description: Darrin becomes very insecure when Samantha and Endora start playing with the features on his face.

title: Remember the Main
description: Samantha is deeply involved with a local election and with Endora's help, manages to expose a corrupt politician.

title: Eat at Mario's
description: Samantha and Endora's attempts to save their favorite Italian restaurant could cost Darrin his job.

title: Cousin Edgar
description: Samantha's Cousin Edgar is an elf who plays tricks on Darrin to try and break up their mixed marriage.

title: Alias Darrin Stephens
description: Just as Samantha wants to tell Darrin of the good news of her pregnancy, Aunt Clara turns Darrin into a chimp.

title: A Very Special Delivery
description: After some ill-advised comments from Darrin, Endora makes him feel every pregnancy related symptom that Samantha has.

title: We're in for a Bad Spell
description: Samantha helps out a mortal who has a 200 year old family curse on him.

title: My Grandson, the Warlock
description: While Samantha is watching the Tate's new baby, Gladys Kravtiz makes an ill-informed comment to Maurice who whisks his "new" grandson off to London.

title: The Joker Is a Card
description: Uncle Arthur makes his first practical joke laden visit.

title: Take Two Aspirins and Half a Pint of Porpoise Milk
description: After being exposed to a black Peruvian rose, Samantha starts losing her powers and gaining green squares all over her face.

title: Trick or Treat
description: Endora turns Darrin into a werewolf.

title: The Very Informal Dress
description: The evening wear which Aunt Clara conjures up for Darrin and Samantha does not last the evening.

title: ...And Then I Wrote
description: While writing a Civil War play Samantha finds her characters coming to life.

title: Junior Executive
description: Darrin is turned into a boy by Endora.

title: Aunt Clara's Old Flame
description: Aunt Clara is visited by an old boyfriend.

title: A Strange Little Visitor
description: Darrin and Samantha sit a young warlock for a friend of Samantha's.

title: My Boss, the Teddy Bear
description: Darrin thinks that Larry Tate has been turned into a teddy bear by Endora.

title: Speak the Truth
description: Endora gives Darrin a statue that makes anyone near it tell the truth.

title: A Vision of Sugar Plums
description: When an orphan visits the Stevens' for Christmas who doesn't believe in Santa Claus, Samantha takes him to the North Pole to visit the real Santa Claus. (Repeat of episode 1.15)

title: The Magic Cabin
description: Staying at Larry Tate's rundown weekend cabin, Samantha uses her magic to fix it up. Two prospective buyers see the lovely cabin and want to buy it from Larry.

title: Maid to Order
description: Darrin and Samantha hire a hopeless maid who creates more problems than she solves.

title: And Then There Were Three
description: Samantha gives birth to Tabitha and Darrin meets Serena for the first time.

title: My Baby, the Tycoon
description: When Tabitha is given a stock as a present, it mysteriously starts to rise and Darrin thinks that Tabitha is fooling with the stock market.

title: Samantha Meets the Folks
description: Samantha meets Darrin's parents for the first time while Aunt Clara is also visiting. Repeat of episode 1.14.

title: Fastest Gun on Madison Avenue
description: Samantha helps Darrin defend himself with a bit of magic when he has a misunderstanding with a prize fighter.

title: The Dancing Bear
description: Both grandmothers bring Tabitha identical stuffed bears. Endora turns her bear into a dancing bear.

title: Double Tate
description: After wishing to be his boss for a day, Darrin turns into Larry Tate.

title: Samantha the Dressmaker
description: Samantha zaps up dresses for her neighbors that are copies of designer originals which she saw in Paris. However, her actions cause trouble when the original designer shows up.

title: The Horse's Mouth
description: Samantha turns an escaped racehorse into a human.

title: Baby's First Paragraph
description: After Endora hears Gladys rant about how smart her nephew is, she casts a spell and has the infant Tabitha talking.

title: The Leprechaun
description: Samantha must help a leprechaun from Darrin's side of the family.

title: Double Split
description: After a misunderstanding at a party, its up to Samantha to get Darrin and Larry back together.

title: Disappearing Samantha
description: Lecturer Osgood Rightmire declares that witches do not exist and unknowingly puts a curse on Samantha. Rightmire actor is Bernard Fox who will later play semi-regular Doctor Bombay.

title: Follow That Witch: Part 1
description: A detective one of Darrin's client's employees hires discovers that Samantha is a witch. His employer thinks that he is crazy so he decides to blackmail Samantha.

title: Follow That Witch: Part 2
description: A detective one of Darrin's client's employees hires discovers that Samantha is a witch. His employer thinks that he is crazy so he decides to blackmail Samantha.

title: A Bum Raps
description: Samantha mistakes a house thief for Darrin's Uncle Albert.

title: Divided He Falls
description: Endora divides Darrin into his serious work half and his fun-loving half so Samantha can go on a planned vacation.

title: Man's Best Friend
description: Former flame Rodney turns himself into a dog to break up Darrin and Sam's marriage.

title: The Catnapper
description: Detective Charlie Leach kidnaps Darrin's client after she is turned into a cat.

title: What Every Young Man Should Know
description: Darrin and Samantha revisit their courtship to find out if Darrin would have proposed if he knew she was a witch.

title: The Girl with the Golden Nose
description: After Larry Tate changes his mind about giving Darrin an account, Darrin is sure Samantha's magic is behind Larry's change of heart.

title: Prodigy
description: Samantha provides encouragement to Gladys Kravitz's violinist brother Louis.

title: Nobody's Perfect
description: Samantha learns about Tabitha's magical powers.

title: The Moment of Truth
description: Samantha has to get up the courage to tell Darrin about their "magical" daughter and keep the secret from the Tates.

title: Witches and Warlocks Are My Favorite Things
description: Tabitha's powers are tested by her family. Samantha is horrified and they announce that they are determined to raise Tabitha in a proper little witches school.

title: Accidental Twins
description: Aunt Clara accidentally duplicates the Tate's son Jonathan.

title: A Most Unusual Wood Nymph
description: A wood nymph comes after Darrin and Samantha must travel back in time to save Darrin the Bold.

title: Endora Moves in for a Spell
description: Endora and Uncle Arthur are bickering and a house across the street keeps appearing and disappearing.

title: Twitch or Treat
description: Endora throws a Halloween party at Darrin and Samantha's and Uncle Arthur causes havoc.

title: Dangerous Diaper Dan
description: Diaper Dan is spying on Darrin and Samantha for a rival ad agency.

title: The Short Happy Circuit of Aunt Clara
description: Aunt Clara causes the East Coast Blackout and summons her boyfriend Ocky to help her out.

title: I'd Rather Twitch Than Fight
description: The Tates try and counsel the bickering Stevens over an old jacket of Darrin's that Sam sent to the Goodwill. Endora whips up Sigmund Freud to help them out.

title: Oedipus Hex
description: A hexed bowl of popcorn turns everyone visiting the Stevens' home into irresponsible homebodies.

title: Sam's Spooky Chair
description: Samantha is haunted by a chair that is very attached to her.

title: My Friend Ben
description: After Aunt Clara conjures up Benjamin Franklin, he gets arrested for stealing an antique firetruck as part of a supposed advertising stunt.

title: Samantha for the Defense
description: After Aunt Clara conjures up Benjamin Franklin, he gets arrested for stealing an antique firetruck as part of a supposed advertising stunt.

title: A Gazebo Never Forgets
description: A bank employee witnesses one of Aunt Clara's goofs and tells everyone that the Steven's have a big polka dotted elephant.

title: Soapbox Derby
description: Sam encourages a local boy who is entering the Soapbox Derby Races.

title: Sam in the Moon
description: Samantha and Endora visit Tokyo together and when Darrin keeps asking her where she has been Sam says that she went to the moon. Darrin believes her.

title: Hoho the Clown
description: Endora makes the TV clown for Darrin's client fall in love with her granddaughter, Tabitha.

title: Super Car
description: Trying to win Darrin over, Endora zaps up a futurist car for him. Darrin is pleased until he finds out she stole it from the real car company.

title: The Corn Is as High as a Guernsey's Eye
description: Depressed Aunt Clara wants to turn herself into a useful object. On a trip to town to cheer her help Sam comes across a famous cow belonging to one of Darrin's clients and kidnaps it thinking that it is her aunt.

title: The Trial and Error of Aunt Clara
description: The Witches Council puts Clara on trial for incompetency and Clara asks Samantha to defend her.

title: Three Wishes
description: Endora gives Darrin three wishes without telling him and Samantha thinks that Darrin used them to be trapped in Boston with a beautiful model.

title: I Remember You... Sometimes
description: Endora gives Darrin a perfect memory much to the annoyance to his know-it-all client.

title: Art for Sam's Sake
description: Endora exchanges Samantha's amateur painting with a real masterpiece that makes quite a stir at the local art festival.

title: Charlie Harper, Winner
description: Darrin and Samantha find themselves competing with Darrin's college buddy and his wife.

title: Aunt Clara's Victoria Victory
description: Thanks to bumbling Aunt Clara, Samantha is being visited by Queen Victoria.

title: The Crone of Cawdor
description: An ancient crone has taken over the body of the daughter of one of Darrin's clients and if Darrin kisses her, they will trade ages. Sam must protect him without appearing jealous.

title: No More Mr. Nice Guy
description: Thanks to Endora's spell, everyone takes an instant dislike to Darrin.

title: It's Wishcraft
description: Tabitha is developing wish-craft and Samantha must hide the secret from Darrin's parent.

title: How to Fail in Business with All Kinds of Help
description: Darrin looses an account when he thinks his client Madame Maruska is Endora trying to help his career.

title: Bewitched, Bothered and Infuriated
description: Clara conjures up a newspaper that reports that Larry Tate broke his leg on the honeymoon trip they were currently on. The Stevens then become a bother on their vacation trying to protect Larry.

title: Nobody But a Frog Knows How to Live
description: A man keeps following Samantha and wants her to turn him back into a frog.

title: There's Gold in Them Thar Pills
description: Darrin and Larry try to get Doctor Bombay to market his magical miracle cold cure.

title: Long Live the Queen
description: Samantha is elected Queen of the Witches which causes problems with Darrin's marriage and household.

title: Toys in Babeland
description: While off on an errand Endora bring one of Tabitha's toys to life to babysit her. Tabitha decides that all her toys should likewise come to life.

title: Business, Italian Style
description: To help Darrin with his Italian client, Samantha has him speaking like a native until he loses the ability to understand English.

title: Double, Double, Toil and Trouble
description: Endora feels that Samantha's mortal marriage is interfering with her duties as Queen of the Witches so she calls Serena in to impersonate her and break up she and Darrin's marriage.

title: Cheap, Cheap!
description: Darrin is now the world's greatest miser thanks to Endora's spell.

title: No Zip in My Zap
description: Dr. Bombay has Samantha levitating when her powers gum up due to disuse. Endora answers the phone and tells Darrin she is flying and Darrin mistakes a real fly for his wife.

title: Birdies, Bogies and Baxter
description: Samantha turns Darrin into Arnold Palmer on the golf course during a game with a client.

title: A Safe and Sane Halloween
description: Tabitha brings three storybook goblins to life and they go trick-or-treating with them around Morning Glory Circle.

title: Out of Sync, Out of Mind
description: When Clara tries to fix Darrin's talking home movies, Samantha's real voice gets out of sync during a visit by Darrin's mother.

title: That Was No Chick, That Was My Wife
description: When Samantha pops back from Chicago to check on Tabitha and Louise Tate sees her, Larry mentions it to the client who thinks that Darrin is passing someone else off as his wife.

title: Allergic to Macedonian Dodo Birds
description: Endora and Clara have their powers switched when Endora is exposed to an extinct Do-Do bird.

title: Samantha's Thanksgiving to Remember
description: Through the bumbling magic of Aunt Clara the Steven's family and Mrs. Kravetz spend Thanksgiving with the original pilgrims in 1620.

title: The Solid Gold Mother-in-law
description: Endora's attempt at being the perfect sweet and charming mother-in-law causes a split between Darrin and Larry.

title: My What Big Ears You Have
description: Endora puts a spell on Darrin which causes his ears to grow anytime he lies. Unfortunately he has a surprise present for Samantha which he has to be sneaky about.

title: I Get Your Nannie, You Get My Goat
description: After hiring a magical nanny, her previous employer comes looking for her with a vengeance and zaps Darrin into a mirror.

title: Humbug Not to Be Spoken Here
description: Samantha takes a miserly client of Darrin's to the North Pole on Christmas Eve to meet Santa Claus.

title: Samantha's Da Vinci Dilemma
description: Instead of a house painter, Aunt Clara goofs and conjures up Leonardo da Vinci.

title: Once in a Vial
description: Endora gets Samantha's old beau Rollo the warlock to tempt Samantha. After she rejects him he tries to use a love potion on her that Endora accidentally drinks.

title: Snob in the Grass
description: Darrin's latest account is with the father of his old girlfriend Shelia who is up to her old tricks.

title: If They Never Met
description: During a fight, Darrin says that sometimes he wishes that he and Samantha had never met and Endora grants his wish. Samantha finds him more successful and about to marry his old girlfriend Sheila.

title: Hippie, Hippie, Hooray
description: Serena has gone hippie and ends up on the front page of the newspaper and Darrin has to explain to the Tates about her identical cousin. After hurting Serena's feelings, Darrin can't provide proof of his story. Samantha also sings the If'n song.

title: Prince of a Guy
description: Tabitha conjures up Prince Charming and Darrin's cousin Helen falls for him, but then what girl wouldn't?

title: Mc Tavish
description: Aunt Clara's boyfriend Ockie has a castle that is haunted by a most disagreeable ghost. Samantha goes to England to help him and runs into her vacationing in-laws. After the ghost leaves he takes up residence in the Stephens' house.

title: How Green Was My Grass
description: When artificial grass is mistakenly installed on the Stevens' lawn, Darrin thinks that it is Samantha's doing and tells her to get rid of it. After the real owner comes looking for his turf, Endora hexes their yard and Samantha can't bring the expensive turf back.

title: To Twitch or Not to Twitch
description: In an argument about witchcraft after they get a flat tire, Samantha takes Tabitha and leaves.

title: Playmates
description: On a play-date schedule by Darrin's mother, Tabitha's playmate wishes that he was a dog and Tabitha grants his wish.

title: Tabatha's Cranky Spell
description: Larry asks Sam to help him with a client to modernize his firm.

title: I Confess
description: After Darrin in a fit of frustration says that they should tell everyone about Sam being a witch, she makes him dream about that very situation and the reactions of their friends and the US Government.

title: A Majority of Two
description: Aunt Clara falls for Darrin's elderly Japanese client. Samantha tries to locate her boyfriend Ochy.

title: Samantha's Secret Saucer
description: While trying to retrieve Tabitha's toy flying saucer, Aunt Clara summons a real flying saucer complete with alien crew.

title: The No-Harm Charm
description: Uncle Arthur gives Darrin a charm that he says will protect him from all harm and all witchcraft.

title: Man of the Year
description: Endora places a spell around Darrin so that everyone that comes in contact with him is completely charmed by him.

title: Splitsville
description: Samantha offers Gladys Kravitz a place to stay after a spat puts her on the curb.

title: Samantha's Wedding Present
description: Endora gives Samantha a wedding present on their fifth anniversary much to Darrin's annoyance. Endora calls him a small, small man and Darrin begins to shrink.

title: Samantha Goes South for a Spell
description: A vengeful witch thinking that Samantha was Serena sends her back to 1868 New Orleans. Darrin must go back and rescue her. Not the last time this will happen.

title: Samantha on the Keyboard
description: Endora turns Tabitha into a concert pianist when Sam tires to learn to play the mortal way.

title: Darrin Gone! and Forgotten?
description: A witch who Endora made a deal with centuries ago kidnaps Darrin and insists that Samantha marry her wimpy son.

title: It's So Nice to Have a Spouse Around the House
description: While Samantha secretly attends a Witches Council meeting, Serena substitutes for Samantha and Darrin takes her off to a second honeymoon.

title: Mirror, Mirror, on the Wall
description: Darrin is changed into the most conceited and vain person in the world by one of Endora's spells.

title: Samantha's French Pastry
description: When trying to conjure up a dessert of the same name, Uncle Arthur produces the real Napoleon Bonaparte.

title: Is It Magic or Imagination?
description: Sam wins a slogan contest that Darrin's mother insists that she enter and wins. Darrin accuses her of using witchcraft since he was in advertising.

title: Samantha Fights City Hall
description: Sam fights city hall to save a park that is also owned by one of Darrin's clients.

title: Samantha Loses Her Voice
description: As a joke Uncle Arthur switches Sam and Darrin's voices and can't seem to switch them back. Unfortunately Louise Tate is visiting due to a fight with Larry.

title: I Don't Want to Be a Toad, I Want to Be a Butterfly
description: When Tabitha's classmate insists she wants to be in the butterfly group, Tabitha turns her into a real butterfly.

title: Weep No More My Willow
description: Samantha calls Doctor Bombay to treat her sick willow tree. She get caught in the spell and begins weeping every time the wind blows. Reversing the spell causes her to laugh uncontrollably until she is cured.

title: Instant Courtesy
description: Darrin is turned into a very nice person by one of Endora's spells.

title: Samantha's Super Maid
description: Darrin's mother hires a maid for Samantha.

title: Cousin Serena Strikes Again: Part 1
description: Serena turns Darrin's Italian client into a monkey.

title: Cousin Serena Strikes Again: Part 2
description: Serena turns Darrin's Italian client into a monkey.

title: One Touch of Midas
description: Endora conjures up a little toy that enchants any human who sees it and is guaranteed to make Darrin and his partners very wealthy.

title: Samantha, the Bard
description: Samantha has contracted a virus that has her talking in rhyme ..all the time.

title: Samantha, the Sculptress
description: When Samantha decides to take up sculpting, Endora zaps up two talking busts of Darrin and Larry Tate.

title: Mrs. Stephens, Where Are You?
description: Serena turns Darrin's mother into a cat.

title: Marriage Witch's Style
description: Serena wants to try mortal men and gets a date through a computer dating service.

title: Going Ape
description: Tabitha turns an ape into a human who immediately gets a job as a model.

title: Tabitha's Weekend
description: The Stevens' insist that their grandchild Tabitha spend the weekend with them. To avert any magical disasters Samantha and Endora join them resulting the adults' squabbling. To escape the problems Tabitha disappears by turning herself into a cookie.

title: The Battle of Burning Oak
description: Samantha takes on the snooty Burning Oaks Country Club after Endora turns Darrin into a snob.

roles.char: Blonde Country Club Guest in Pink Gown

title: Samantha's Power Failure
description: After Samantha's powers are stripped by the Witches Council, Uncle Arthur and Serena give Sam their support and end up losing their powers. Arthur and Serena try and get a job to make it in the mortal world.

title: Samantha Twitches for UNICEF
description: Samantha fools with the life of a man who refuses to donate to UNICEF.

title: Daddy Does His Thing
description: After refusing a magical gift from Maurice, Darrin is turned into a chess playing donkey.

title: Samantha's Good News
description: Endora and Maurice fight over his new secretary.

title: Samantha's Shopping Spree
description: Problems occur when Samantha's cousin Henry goes shopping with Samantha and Endora.

title: Samantha and Darrin in Mexico City
description: When a nervous Darrin has to speak Spanish before a meeting in Mexico City, Endora casts a spell to make all his fears disappear. Unfortunately Darrin completely disappears because he is all fear.

title: Sam and the Beanstalk
description: Sam must retrieve Tabitha who has run away into the book 'Jack and the Beanstalk.'

title: Samantha's Yoo Hoo Maid
description: Enter Esmeralda as Samantha's magical maid who has a tendency to make things appear when she sneezes and fades out at the sight of mortal Darrin.

title: Samantha's Caesar Salad
description: Bumbling Esmerelda zaps up Julius Caesar instead of a Caesar Salad.

title: Samantha's Curious Cravings
description: Correcting Sam's cravings which make the food she desires magically appear, Doctor Bombay reverses the spell, but accidentally makes Sam travel to the food.

title: And Something Makes Four
description: After Samantha gives birth to her son, Maurice casts a spell that makes all who gaze on him fall in love with the child.

title: Naming Samantha's New Baby
description: Angry that the new male child is not named after him, Maurice zaps Darrin into the mirror until the situation is corrected to his satisfaction. The child is finally named Adam.

title: To Trick-Or-Treat or Not to Trick-Or-Treat
description: For participating in Halloween trick-or-treating and disrespecting witches in general, Endora turns Darrin into a stereotypical Halloween witch.

title: A Bunny for Tabitha
description: While performing magic tricks for the neighborhood children, Uncle Arthur produces a "cocktail bunny" instead of a "cottontail bunny" with whom Darren's client falls in love.

title: Samantha's Secret Spell
description: Sam must make Darrin go through some strange things to prevent him from turning into a mouse at midnight.

title: Daddy Comes to Visit
description: Maurice comes for a visit and gives Darrin a magical charm challenging Darrin to try their lifestyle instead of just condemning it. Maurice also gives Darrin a warlock's point of view on the subject.

title: Darrin the Warlock
description: Samantha is worried about Darrin who seems to be enjoying his new found powers too much.

title: Sam's Double Mother Trouble
description: Mother Goose arrives courtesy of one of Esmerelda's goofs at the same time that Darrin's mother makes a surprised visit.

title: You're So Agreeable
description: Darrin is turned into the ultimate yes-man by Endora until she reverses the spell.

title: Santa Comes to Visit and Stays and Stays
description: Esmerelda goofs and zaps up Santa Claus on Christmas Eve who finds that he can't leave. Samanta brings his elves to him turning their house into Santa's toyshop.

title: Samantha's Better Halves
description: Darrin is pulled between going to Japan and staying home with the new baby so Endora tries to help by splitting him into two people.

title: Samantha's Lost Weekend
description: Samantha drinks the milk that was hexed by Esmerelda and goes on an eating binge.

title: The Phrase Is Familiar
description: After learning that plays on words helps Darrin in his line of work, Endora casts a spell that makes Darrin speak only in clichés ... whether she meant to pick on Darrin or not, Endora ends up helping Darrin in the end after all.

title: Samantha's Secret Is Discovered
description: Samantha finally shows her powers to her mother-in-law. After Sam's powers are removed and Phyllis can't prove it to her husband, Phyllis has herself committed to a rest home.

title: Tabitha's Very Own Samantha
description: As Samantha has too much work with the new baby to spend time with her, Tabitha conjures up her own Samantha.

title: Super Arthur
description: To help with Uncle Arthur's ailing magic, Doctor Bombay gives him a pill that makes Arthur turn into anything he thinks of including the character Superman.

title: What Makes Darrin Run?
description: Endora gives Darrin a dose of push and drive and ends up ignoring his family.

title: Serena Stops the Show
description: Serena zaps away Boyce and Hart's popularity so that they will play the Cosmo Cotillion in the witchy realm. Unfortunately Darrin had just talked his client into using this 'hot' group in a television special.

title: Just a Kid Again
description: When a store clerk wishes that he was a kid again, Tabitha grants his wish.

title: The Generation Zap
description: Endora hexes the daughter of Darrin's client so that she has the hots for Darrin.

title: Okay, Who's the Wise Witch?
description: As Samantha has not used her powers enough, she, Darrin, Esmerlda and Doctor Bombay are trapped in the Stephens' house due to a vapor lock.

title: A Chance on Love
description: Darrin's client falls for Samantha thinking that she is Serena.

title: If the Shoe Pinches
description: A leprechaun sent by Endora gives Darrin a pair of shoes that make him terminally lazy.

title: Mona Sammy
description: Endora zaps in a picture of Samantha's look-a-like aunt (Serena's mother?) painted by Leonardo Da Vinci and then puts Darrin's name on it. Larry demands that he paint Louise's picture.

title: Turn on That Old Charm
description: Samantha gives Darrin an amulet that makes Endora be nice and courteous around him. After Endora realizes the trick, she makes Samantha and Darrin constantly bicker.

title: Make Love Not Hate
description: Trouble abounds when a love potion meant for Esmerelda ends up in the clam dip at the Stephens' party.

title: To Go or Not to Go, That Is the Question
description: Queen Hepzibah summons Samantha to a witch's meeting in Salem, Massachusetts, but she refuses, prompting Hepzibah to visit the Stephens and observe their marriage.

title: Salem, Here We Come
description: During Hepzibah's observation of Samantha's marriage to Darrin, she meets one of Darrin's clients, whom Samantha makes fall in love with Hepzibah. Afterwards, the Stephens decide to leave for Salem together.

title: The Salem Saga
description: On their first day in Salem, Samantha is in trouble as an antique bed-warmer starts to follow her around.

title: Samantha's Hot Bedwarmer
description: In part 2, the antique bed warmer turns out to be a rejected suitor of Serena's who must return to 17th century Salem to undo her hex.

title: Darrin on a Pedestal
description: While sight-seeing with Serena in Massachusetts, she brings the Fisherman's Memorial to life and replaces the statue with Darrin.

title: Paul Revere Rides Again
description: Through another goof by Esmerelda in trying to return a Paul Revere teapot, she zaps up the real Paul Revere and his horse.

title: Samantha's Bad Day in Salem
description: Waldo, an old flame of Samantha's, conjures a fake adoring Samantha who is seen by Larry. When Darrin confronts Waldo, he is turned into a crow.

title: Samantha's Old Salem Trip
description: When Sam and Darrin abruptly return home Sam is summoned back by the Witches Council. Esmerelda hastily sends Sam back to Salem - seventeenth century Salem.

title: Samantha's Pet Warlock
description: A warlock who has come to 'save' Sam from her mortal marriage turns himself into an unusual dog that helps Darrin with an account.

title: Samantha's Old Man
description: After another argument with Darrin, Endora turns him into an old man, which forces him to pose as his grandfather Grover Stephens and causes all sorts of complications.

title: The Corsican Cousins
description: Endora zaps Samantha so that she feels everything that Serena feels both physically and emotionally.

title: Samantha's Magic Potion
description: When a discouraged Darrin asks for a potion to burst his creativity and give him confidence, Samantha slips him a placebo.

title: Sisters at Heart
description: When Tabitha wants to be sisters with her black friend Lisa, she casts a spell and they both end up polka-dotted. Through another misunderstanding Darrin's client wants him off the account because he thinks that Lisa is his daughter.

title: The Mother-in-Law of the Year
description: Upon the suggestion of Endora, the owner of Bobbins Bonbons make her Mother-In-Law of the Year. When she doesn't show up Samantha turns herself into her mother.

title: Mary, the Good Fairy
description: When Mary the Good Fairy, an old friend of Samantha's, visits Tabitha, Samantha gives her a bit too much brandy and she has to take her place.

title: The Good Fairy Strikes Again
description: Samantha must convince Mary to return to her job as the Good Fairy.

title: The Return of Darrin the Bold
description: Darrin starts to exhibit examples of wish-craft after Serena gives Darrin's ancestor Darrin the Bold magical powers.

title: The House That Uncle Arthur Built
description: To appease his current love Aretha, Uncle Arthur infects Sam's house with his practical jokes.

title: Samantha and the Troll
description: Things go amiss when Serena takes over the household while Sam is having a medical checkup.

title: This Little Piggie
description: Endora zaps a pig's head on "pig headed" Darrin which helps him with one of his client's accounts.

title: Mixed Doubles
description: Samantha wakes up in Larry Tate's bed as Lousie Tate. When returning to her home, she finds Louise thinking she is Samantha and Darrin is not noticing any difference.

title: Darrin Goes Ape
description: Serena turns Darrin into an ape.

title: Money Happy Returns
description: When Endora accuses Darrin of being cheap, Darrin finds a bag full of $100,000 which he thinks Endroa zapped up. It is really stolen money that some crooks want back.

title: Out of the Mouths of Babes
description: Endora turns Darrin into a young boy.

title: Samantha's Psychic Slip
description: After Darrin catches Sam using witchcraft to clean the house, she develops a case of the hiccups that make bicycles magically appear.

title: Samantha's Magic Mirror
description: Samantha fixes all the mirrors in the house so that the depressed Esmerelda will look prettier just before her old boyfriend shows up.

title: Laugh, Clown, Laugh
description: First Endora has Darrin constantly telling jokes and then reverses the spell so that he laughs whenever he hears something sad or horrible.

title: Samantha and the Antique Doll
description: Samantha allows Darrin's mother to think that she has magical powers. A fake séance cures her of this idea.

title: How Not to Lose Your Head to Henry VIII: Part 1
description: While vacationing in England Samantha frees a trapped nobleman from a painting. The witch who trapped him punishes Sam by sending her back to the time of Henry the VIII. While Henry wants to make Sam his next queen, Darren must travel to the sixteenth century and rescue her.

title: How Not to Lose Your Head to Henry VIII: Part 2
description: In the second part, Darrin and Endora rescue Sam by Darrin competing in a wrestling match with Henry the VIII.

title: Samantha and the Loch Ness Monster
description: The Loch Ness monster is really one of Serena's old suiters. After Sam gets Serena to turn him back, he turns Serena into a mermaid.

title: Samantha's Not So Leaning Tower of Pisa
description: While in Pisa, Esmeralda corrects one of her former goof-ups by straightening the Leaning Tower of Pisa.

title: Bewitched, Bothered and Baldoni
description: In Rome, Endora brings a statue of Venus to life to tempt Darrin.

title: Paris, Witches Style
description: In Paris, Endora zaps up a fake Darrin to appease an irate Maurice who is angry as they did not visit him while in London. The real Darrin shows up and Maurice zaps him onto the top of the Eiffel Tower.

title: The Ghost Who Made a Spectre of Himself
description: When visiting a castle in England, Darrin is possessed by a ghost who wants to get closer to Samantha. After he is rejected as Darrin, he makes a pass at Louise Tate.

title: TV or Not TV
description: Tabitha temporarily becomes a TV star when she pops into a children's show to reprimand two aggressive puppets.

title: A Plague on Maurice and Samantha
description: After Samantha loses her powers, Maurice visits and comes down with the same affliction.

title: Hansel and Gretel in Samanthaland
description: After Tabitha zaps Hansel and Gretel out of the story, Samantha must enter it to go after the runaway Tabitha.

title: The Warlock in the Gray Flannel Suit
description: Endora causes trouble at McMahon and Tate when she has a warlock join the firm.

title: The Eight Year Itch Witch
description: Endora summons a witch named Ophelia to tempt Darren.

title: Three Men and a Witch on a Horse
description: After Endora gives Darrin a gambling addiction, she makes sure his horse will lose the race. Sam convinces the horse to win.

title: Adam, Warlock or Washout
description: Adam is to be tested for magic powers and if he is normal, he is to be taken away from Sam and Darrin.

title: Samantha's Magic Sitter
description: When Esmeralda babysits for Mr. Norton, one of Darrin's clients, trouble ensues after she performs magic for Norton's son.

title: Samantha Is Earthbound
description: After Samantha finds herself weighing hundreds of pounds, Doctor Bombay's cure makes her weightless just before she has to participate in a charity bazaar.

title: Serena's Richcraft
description: Powerless Serena falls for Darrin's rich client.

title: Samantha on Thin Ice
description: While Tabitha is taking beginning skating lessons Endora bewitches her skates turning into a championship skater.

title: Serena's Youth Pill
description: Serena gives Larry Tate, old 'cotton top', a youth pill that makes him younger and younger.

title: Tabitha's First Day at School
description: During Tabitha's first day at school, she turns a bully into a frog.

title: George Washington Zapped Here: Part 1
description: Helping Tabitha with a school project, Esmerelda zaps up the real George Washington. When he wanders from the Stephens' home, he is arrested for public speaking without a permit.

title: George Washington Zapped Here: Part 2
description: In part two, George Washington goes in front of a judge and is exonerated by telling the truth.

title: School Days, School Daze
description: When Tabitha is worried about taking an intelligence test, Endora casts a spell and turns her into a genius.

title: A Good Turn Never Goes Unpunished
description: When Sam makes some suggestions for Darrin's ad campaign, he rejects them thinking that they are the product of witchcraft.

title: Sam's Witchcraft Blows a Fuse
description: After drinking a "The Heavenly Himalayana" at a Chinese restaurant, Sam loses her powers and stripes breakout on her face.

title: The Truth, Nothing But the Truth, So Help Me, Sam
description: Endora gives Darrin a pin that makes anyone who comes near him tell the truth.
